updates.title: Add post-game lifecycle and next-game queuing logic
updates.content:
Add post-game lifecycle and next-game queuing logic

Commit: 9beabb4

- Implemented lifecycle management for post-game sessions with inactivity handling and countdowns.

updates.title: Add multiplayer room chat and whisper functionality
updates.content:
Add multiplayer room chat and whisper functionality

Commit: 3224403

- Introduced support for public room chat and direct whispers (`room_channel`).

updates.title: Add support for turn actions and session state updates with dice selection logic
updates.content:
Add support for turn actions and session state updates with dice selection logic

Commit: 38acc7d

- Introduced `select` turn action for granular dice selection.

updates.title: Add `canManualNewGame` checks to restrict manual game starts during multiplayer sessions
updates.content:
Add `canManualNewGame` checks to restrict manual game starts during multiplayer sessions

Commit: 178e337

- Introduced `canManualNewGame()` method to ensure manual game starts are disabled in multiplayer mode or active session states.

updates.title: Add server-synced game start time and clock offset logic
updates.content:
Add server-synced game start time and clock offset logic

Commit: 8c75625

- Introduced `gameStartedAt` and `serverNow` fields to synchronize game start and server timestamps.

updates.title: Add multiplayer invite autostart and stale participant pruning
updates.content:
Add multiplayer invite autostart and stale participant pruning

Commit: a45c19d

- Added `maybeAutoStartFromMultiplayerInvite` for initiating sessions directly from invite links.

updates.title: Add support for queuing participants for the next game
updates.content:
Add support for queuing participants for the next game

Commit: 9acfb0c

- Introduced `queuedForNextGame` attribute to manage participants waiting for the next game.

updates.title: Add retry mechanisms for profile and avatar texture fetching
updates.content:
Add retry mechanisms for profile and avatar texture fetching

Commit: 1b4e000

- Introduced retry logic with cooldowns for user profile (`ACCOUNT_PROFILE_RETRY_COOLDOWN_MS`) and avatar textures (`AVATAR_TEXTURE_RETRY_BASE_MS` and `AVATAR_TEXTURE_RETRY_MAX_MS`) to handle intermittent failures.

updates.title: Improve RNG seeding strategy and enhance dice rotation logic
updates.content:
Improve RNG seeding strategy and enhance dice rotation logic

Commit: f6e7245

- Updated `RNG` to derive independent 32-bit states using salted seed variants for better entropy.

updates.title: Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI
updates.content:
Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI

Commit: 0875032

- Updated leaderboard logic to handle anonymous users and initialize user profiles securely.

updates.title: Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI
updates.content:
Integrate new features and fixes for leaderboard, proxy, and UI

Commit: e75cfcf

- Updated leaderboard logic to handle anonymous users and initialize user profiles securely.

updates.title: Update global leaderboard fetch logic and improve API payload handling
updates.content:
Update global leaderboard fetch logic and improve API payload handling

Commit: 730d6b0

- Added support for legacy array-based responses in `getGlobalLeaderboard`.

updates.title: Update bot avatar selection and improve randomness logic
updates.content:
Update bot avatar selection and improve randomness logic

Commit: 094c065

- Adjusted bot avatar rotation to ensure unique assignment using retries (`BOT_MEME_UNIQUE_ATTEMPTS`).

updates.title: Make `/api/players/:playerId/scores` endpoint public
updates.content:
Make `/api/players/:playerId/scores` endpoint public

Commit: 03a1316

- Removed auth requirement for score history reads to ensure leaderboard and personal history views remain accessible for guests and clients with stale session tokens.

updates.title: Add image proxy support for bot meme avatars and backend fetch handling
updates.content:
Add image proxy support for bot meme avatars and backend fetch handling

Commit: 87614b3

- Implemented `/api/media/image-proxy` endpoint for secure image fetching and CORS mitigation.

updates.title: Add multi-provider support for bot meme avatars and improve API key handling
updates.content:
Add multi-provider support for bot meme avatars and improve API key handling

Commit: 9fe47e9

- Added support for multiple meme API providers (`humorapi` and `apileague`) with failover capabilities.

updates.title: Update rules and documentation for camera assist and focus cycling
updates.content:
Update rules and documentation for camera assist and focus cycling

Commit: e702f53

- Adjusted keyboard focus navigation instructions to include +/- keys alongside arrow keys.

updates.title: **[feature/api-testing] Tokenize global styles and enhance camera focus behaviors**
updates.content:
**[feature/api-testing] Tokenize global styles and enhance camera focus behaviors**

Commit: 9039094

- Replaced hardcoded CSS styles with reusable global variables for colors, gradients, shadows, and borders.

updates.title: Add camera assist feature and improve keyboard focus navigation
updates.content:
Add camera assist feature and improve keyboard focus navigation

Commit: 2864348

- Introduced camera assist toggle for Easy mode with automated camera movements after scoring.

updates.title: Add camera assist feature and improve keyboard focus navigation
updates.content:
Add camera assist feature and improve keyboard focus navigation

Commit: da062cc

- Introduced camera assist toggle for Easy mode with automated camera movements after scoring.

updates.title: Apply UI variable definitions for consistent theming and interchangeable styles
updates.content:
Apply UI variable definitions for consistent theming and interchangeable styles

Commit: 7f9c563

- Introduced global CSS variables for colors, borders, gradients, and surfaces.

updates.title: Integrate bot avatar rotation and improve multiplayer bot avatar management
updates.content:
Integrate bot avatar rotation and improve multiplayer bot avatar management

Commit: 52c3aa2

- Added `botMemeAvatarService` for bot meme avatar generation with fallback support.

updates.title: Refactor color variables and gradients for enhanced styling consistency across themes.
updates.content:
Refactor color variables and gradients for enhanced styling consistency across themes.

Commit: ca0aa72

Ticket: feature/api-testing

updates.title: Add `updates:generate` script and integrate it into build and development workflows
updates.content:
Add `updates:generate` script and integrate it into build and development workflows

Commit: c62534d

- Introduced `scripts/generate-updates-from-git.mjs` to generate JSON data from commit history.

updates.title: Enhance `SplashBackground3D` with interactive dice animation, police lighting effects, and improved gradient backgrounds
updates.content:
Enhance `SplashBackground3D` with interactive dice animation, police lighting effects, and improved gradient backgrounds

Commit: bf2b6eb

- Added interactive dice nudging and police lighting mode triggered by user input.

updates.title: Remove geometry loader and legacy materials, enhance ParticleService runtime position resolvers
updates.content:
Remove geometry loader and legacy materials, enhance ParticleService runtime position resolvers

Commit: ba97065

- Deleted unused dice geometry loader (`geometryLoader.ts`) and legacy materials (`materials.ts`).

updates.title: Remove `VITE_ASSET_BASE_URL` references from CI and documentation
updates.content:
Remove `VITE_ASSET_BASE_URL` references from CI and documentation

Commit: c377a29

- Eliminated unused `VITE_ASSET_BASE_URL` and related variables in Firebase deployment workflows.

updates.title: Add CORS autoconfiguration for public Firebase buckets
updates.content:
Add CORS autoconfiguration for public Firebase buckets

Commit: 5910e97

- Introduced `CDN_AUTOCONFIGURE_CORS` to enable automatic CORS policy setup for Firebase Storage buckets.

updates.title: Add multi-URL fallback support for asset fetching
updates.content:
Add multi-URL fallback support for asset fetching

Commit: de296f1

- Refactored asset URL resolution in `assetUrl.ts` to support multiple candidates for improved reliability.

updates.title: Update CI and documentation for private CDN mode support
updates.content:
Update CI and documentation for private CDN mode support

Commit: 57c7678

- Updated default values for `CDN_REQUIRE_PUBLIC_READ` and `CDN_AUTOCONFIGURE_PUBLIC_READ` to `0` for private mode.

updates.title: Align BISCUITS metadata and CI workflows with production URLs
updates.content:
Align BISCUITS metadata and CI workflows with production URLs

Commit: 6ef2940

- Updated social sharing metadata (Facebook/Open Graph/Twitter) to use production BISCUITS site and CDN ad images.

updates.title: Update Firebase deployment workflow and asset upload logic
updates.content:
Update Firebase deployment workflow and asset upload logic

Commit: 7cb17b9

- Added fallback bucket URL resolution for CDN smoke verification to avoid false negatives.

updates.title: Add Firestore cutover checks and CI enhancements
updates.content:
Add Firestore cutover checks and CI enhancements

Commit: 29fe62a

- Introduced storage cutover verification in CI workflows (`E2E_ASSERT_STORAGE_CUTOVER`) to validate Firestore backend/prefix and section count schema.

updates.title: Update Firebase asset upload with project-based bucket resolution
updates.content:
Update Firebase asset upload with project-based bucket resolution

Commit: b790710

- Added `FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID` support to `upload-assets-to-firebase-storage.mjs`.

updates.title: Add CDN asset verification and related workflow updates
updates.content:
Add CDN asset verification and related workflow updates

Commit: 5714e7d

- Introduced `cdn:verify` script for validating uploaded Firebase Storage assets.

updates.title: Add cache control support for Firebase asset uploads
updates.content:
Add cache control support for Firebase asset uploads

Commit: 5336964

- Added optional `--asset-cache-control` and `--content-cache-control` flags to `upload-assets-to-firebase-storage.mjs`.

updates.title: Update asset management and CDN integration
updates.content:
Update asset management and CDN integration

Commit: d60fa79

- Added support for optional CDN asset serving via `VITE_ASSET_BASE_URL`.

updates.title: Add Facebook share metadata and provider-based avatar support
updates.content:
Add Facebook share metadata and provider-based avatar support

Commit: f55e145

- Implemented social sharing metadata for Facebook, including Open Graph tags and dynamic canonical URL generation.

updates.title: Improve global leaderboard error handling and UI fallback
updates.content:
Improve global leaderboard error handling and UI fallback

Commit: 185811f

- Updated `getGlobalLeaderboard` to return `null` instead of an empty array on failure.

updates.title: Remove Google Sign-In button and related logic from leaderboard UI
updates.content:
Remove Google Sign-In button and related logic from leaderboard UI

Commit: a2be08b

- Eliminated the display and handling of Google Sign-In button in the global leaderboard UI.
